name: Calcugamor
description:
A dumbass working calculator with useful features and a mini-game inside it (Access it from settings).

Some features in the CALC :

  • A percentage calculating ( inputs: Part, All - output: % ).
  • Common logarithm ( log ).
  • Save any number as variable ( as ID ).
  • Dark / Light mode

Mini-game roles :

  • Delete every number before falling into the container
  • After passing 2 min you should calculate the sum of the number in the container
  • A timer will start and your score will -1 each second

CALCULATE YOUR EQUATIONS & HAVE FUN!!
